SMS/Text Message Terms

Effective Date: January 7, 2026

SMS Consent & Opt-In

Program Name: Marceau Solutions Notifications

By providing your mobile phone number and expressly consenting via a separate SMS opt-in checkbox on our signup form, you agree to receive recurring automated text messages from Marceau Solutions LLC at the phone number provided.

Consent is Not a Condition of Purchase

Your consent to receive SMS messages is NOT required as a condition of purchasing any goods or services from Marceau Solutions. You may opt out at any time and still use our services.

Types of messages you may receive:

  • Welcome messages and account confirmations
  • Service updates and feature announcements
  • Appointment and deadline reminders
  • Tips and resources related to your AI assistant
  • Account security alerts

Message Frequency

Message frequency varies. You may receive approximately 2-8 messages per month depending on your account activity and preferences. Message frequency may increase during onboarding or when you request specific notifications.

Message and Data Rates

Important Notice

Message and data rates may apply. Standard messaging rates from your wireless carrier apply to messages you send and receive. Marceau Solutions does not charge for SMS messages, but your carrier may. Check with your mobile carrier for details about your text messaging plan.

How to Opt-Out (STOP)

You can stop receiving SMS messages at any time using any of these methods:

  • Text STOP to any message you receive from us to immediately unsubscribe
  • Text CANCEL, END, QUIT, or UNSUBSCRIBE - all work the same as STOP
  • Email us at wmarceau@marceausolutions.com with your phone number
  • Update your communication preferences in your account settings

After texting STOP, you will receive one final confirmation message: "You have successfully been unsubscribed. You will not receive any more messages from Marceau Solutions. Reply START to re-subscribe."

You will not receive any additional messages unless you explicitly opt back in by texting START or re-enrolling through our website.

How to Get Help (HELP)

If you need assistance with our SMS program:

  • Text HELP to any message for automated assistance
  • Email: wmarceau@marceausolutions.com
  • Phone: +1 (855) 239-9364

When you text HELP, you will receive: "Marceau Solutions: For help, email wmarceau@marceausolutions.com or call (855) 239-9364. To stop messages, reply STOP."

Supported Carriers

Our SMS service is compatible with all major U.S. mobile carriers, including but not limited to: AT&T, Verizon Wireless, T-Mobile, Sprint, U.S. Cellular, Cricket, MetroPCS, Boost Mobile, Virgin Mobile, and others. Carrier participation may vary. Messages may not be deliverable to all carriers.

Mobile Information Privacy - NO SHARING

Your Privacy is Protected

We will NOT sell, rent, loan, trade, lease, or otherwise transfer for profit any phone numbers or personal information collected through our SMS program to any third party.

Your mobile phone number and opt-in consent data are used solely to deliver the messages you have requested from Marceau Solutions. We do not share this information with third parties for their marketing purposes, affiliates, or any lead generation services.
